channel.title: House on Jack Hayes
channel.description: Recent content in House on Jack Hayes

item.title: Venting
item.description: Summary Clickbait title, couldn’t resist the obvious one! This page is just a collection of details on the vents in my house for future Jack. Vents (Exhaust Units) Exhaust units are the devices that pull air out of a room (manufacturer’s nomenclature). There are three vents in the house. These are located in the kitchen, downstairs toilet and upstairs bathroom. They all look similar but are actually different variants, all designed by Aereco.

item.title: What I know about Ecodan ASHPs
item.description: Summary The following is a meandering post on what I’ve learnt about heat pumps (and more specifically the Ecodan range from Mistubishi). Map of the Plumbing Adding a smart sensor It’s possible to add a smart sensor to this heating system. The model number I used was 587IF-E. When I was trying to source this, there was confusion online about the fact that there are multiple variants. It seems like there’s a different part number for Austrialian models (or something).
